mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FILE(FILE_NUMBER, FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_UUID, FILE_IMAGE_CHECK, FILE_SIZE, BOARD_NUMBER) VALUES(SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, #{fileName}, #{fileUploadPath}, #{fileUuid}, #{fileImageCheck}, #{fileSize}, #{boardNumber})
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NUMBER, FILE_NAME, FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, FILE_UUID, FILE_IMAGE_CHECK,FILE_SIZE, BOARD_NUMBER FROM TBL_FILE WHERE FILE_UPLOAD_PATH = TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE - 1, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
